name: Gustaf Ferdinand Lundquist
obverse: Bust of Gustaf Ferdinand Lundquist facing left.
reverse: At the top, a vase with a crown on top. Below, inscription in 6 lines.
reverse_inscriptions: A/B FERD. LUNDQUIST & CO LÄT PRÄGLA DENNA MEDALJ FÖR ATT HEDRA SIN GRUNDARE PÅ 100-ÅRS DAGEN AV HANS FÖDELSE
description: Gustaf Ferdinand Lundquist was born on March 5, 1837 and died on July 24, 1916.
